description:
This is a very short game, made for the #159 Trijam - "Control more than one".

It was made in 2 hours, 4 minutes, and 19.64 seconds.

The goal is to control a player who has a "number" attached to them, which MUST be greater than 1(or it will be destroyed), and, if permitted, can be split in half, allowing you to "Control more than one" that way.

There is a tutorial level explaining the basic mechanics, and a very easy "main" level.
